name: Unlock The King
description:
A originally designed puzzle game inspired by Chess. Move the pieces and create a path to Unlock the King.

  • 100 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity.
  • Originally designed concept, including electronic board, lightning-fast piece movements, trigger buttons and movable parts;
  • Extremely easy to learn and extremely complex to master;
  • Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles
  • A fun chess puzzle now available to everyone (even to those who never played chess)
